The admin reused a prime for two RSA keys by mistake. Can you decrypt this intercepted message: 562364679753358857280445179010743803782354377066994396166591314701877448662448450758103533020001104567821704756840751017825511280886793839533101029171593593684536108268821489268145766224928098223973801677832083827753070813250653245?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=621609335665273374773109798955709482941860558624613421280558787610349912878535217125334070471058701601915022041346384859929765902046218166249408994654076606604824535544433195047343005705329888552760749274804693727630380514887245481, e=512743153371225943476390600940887599116683577823169522405077736220432994879756416042991170033374397226558035120219075950370178888743291634805871053196656057235423619617407742632837996565957662718309751786470611967439379641979580891

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{9y6vhvi4}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 562364679753358857280445179010743803782354377066994396166591314701877448662448450758103533020001104567821704756840751017825511280886793839533101029171593593684536108268821489268145766224928098223973801677832083827753070813250653245
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=621609335665273374773109798955709482941860558624613421280558787610349912878535217125334070471058701601915022041346384859929765902046218166249408994654076606604824535544433195047343005705329888552760749274804693727630380514887245481, e=512743153371225943476390600940887599116683577823169522405077736220432994879756416042991170033374397226558035120219075950370178888743291634805871053196656057235423619617407742632837996565957662718309751786470611967439379641979580891
extra_info: p=24932094490140080783744257667654440961863791320446353059870123128706345978691392594270702880083543510601113818019059, q=24932094490140080783744257667654440961863791320446353059870123128706345978691392594270702880083543510601113818019059, Ï†(n)=621609335665273374773109798955709482941860558624613421280558787610349912878535217125334070471058701601915022041346334995740785621884650677734073685772152879022183642838313454801085593013372505767572207869044526640609178287251207364
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
